scripts.postinstall: cd MakePDF && npm install && cd ../VoiceNotify && npm install
scripts.postversion: cd MakePDF && npm version -- $npm_package_version && cd ../VoiceNotify && npm version -- $npm_package_version && cd ../ && git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push && git tag -a v$npm_package_version HEAD -m "$(git log $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)..HEAD --pretty=format:'%h %s')" && git push origin v$npm_package_version
